name: Skarth
description: A cybernetic horse built for incredible speed. Its lightweight frame sacrifices power for unmatched velocity, leaving trails of ice crystals as it runs.

ability.name: Velocity Boost
ability.description: Speed increases by 50% each turn, up to 3 times. Ice moves gain +2 priority when speed is boosted.

moves.name: Turbo Charge
moves.description: Boosts speed dramatically and next move gains +3 priority.

moves.name: Ice Dash
moves.description: A high-speed ice attack that always goes first.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.description: Slashes with steel claws. May raise attack.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: Relaxes the body to sharply boost speed.

habitat: High-tech racing circuits and frozen laboratories
